snippet: The Thunder have taken the first two games of their series against the Mavericks. The games have been overly physical, and Mavericks Coach Rick Carlisle isn't happy.
abstract: The Thunder have taken the first two games of their series against the Mavericks. The games have been overly physical, and Mavericks Coach Rick Carlisle isn't happy.

headline.main: Emotions Run High in Mavericks-Thunder Series
